review: Good luck trying to get the batteries into the remote!  None of my neighbors and friends could figure out how to open the remote and put in the batteries.  And the firestick has to be plugged in to an electrical socket, so it's not like just inserting a memory stick into the back of the TV.  The stick sticks out from the back of my TV, is visible when looking at the TV screen from the front, and I have an extra cord dangling from it.  Hmmpf!  I will be returning it.
